participant_1.background:
I met the love of my life while working at the hospital.
i like to make boats on the weekends.
i wish that i could be an animal.
i enjoy baking and cooking.
I do care about my appearance, but it's not my main focus.

participant_2.background:
My dad and brother are my two main sources of support.
i always put my left sock on first.
I want to learn how to use technology in the classroom to engage my students and help them learn better.
my favorite music is rock and roll.
i write children s books.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
I'm doing pretty well, thanks! How about you?
What's your favorite thing to do for fun?
I like to bake and cook. I also like to make boats on the weekends.
That's awesome! I like to write children's books. I also like rock and roll music.
That's cool! I write children's books too. I'm not sure what I like more, writing or baking.
I think I would say writing, because it's more creative. But baking is really fun too!
Baking can be really therapeutic. I love the smell of fresh baked bread.
Me too! I love the smell of fresh baked cookies.
What's your favorite kind of cookie?
I like chocolate chip cookies the best. But I also like peanut butter cookies.
Me too! I love chocolate chip cookies. They're so delicious!
Me too! I like to make them with my kids. It's a lot of fun.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love to bake with my kids too.
It's a great way to spend time with them.
